overview: As if one trip to the dungeon of dreams was ever gonna be enough! Once again, the boys from STAXUS arrange a rendezvous amidst the sweaty, spunk-laden confines of the hottest fuck-parlour in town – a place where no ass is safe and where each and every cock can be assured of a warm, wet welcome! Johny Cruz and Dick Casey join the perverted assortment of sling-lovin’ regulars – lads like Yuri Adamov and Mike “the slut” James – for a further series of perverse encounters. Watch out folks, this one’s gonna hurt ...
title: Dungeon Dreams 2
